datoCmsEvent.title: January Workshop: Margaritas & Money with Sonder Financial

featuredImage.alt: Poster with tray of margaritas, text reading: "Monthly Workshop Series: January. 1/27, 7pm at the Artists Co-Op. Money and Margaritas with Sonder Financial."

children.value: Money isn’t just a physical dollar...it’s a reflection of the values we hold, the causes we believe in, and a window into what’s important to us at our core! Sonder Financial shakes up the financial world with vocal allyship of the queer community and a breakdown of the tools & resources that create a sustainable career in the arts. Amateur & experienced mixologists welcome at Margaritas & Money as we mix our own cocktails & demystify the ingredients of a happy relationship with our wallets! Space generously provided by @theartistcoop .

Sonder Financial:
(providing services for the event)

The Artist Co-op:
(providing space for the event)
